description:
A comfy turtleneck for the cabin, the trail, or the office. Made from a super-soft merino wool, this top has the kind of versatile comfort that will keep it at the top of the packing cube or the front the of the drawer, that is, if you aren’t wearing it.

  • Fine gauge merino yarns (17.6 micron) are super-soft and feel great against your skin
  • Turtleneck delivers scarf-like warmth that you will want to snuggle into
  • Biodegradable merino wool reduces waste when you’re done with the garment
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabrics add confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: Bonnetier Merino Turtleneck - Women's
